result.rule: The "update" interface of "BuilderNode" does not accept an object literal. Please replace it with an instance of the class specified in the generic when creating a new "BuilderNode", and ensure that the instance has the same field values as the literal (arkui-buildernode-update-no-literal)
The ArkUI interface "Animator" should be imported before it is used (arkui-modular-interface)
